thread.section_title: Zip Scanners Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Zip Scanners | zipscanners.com
thread.title: Venita Hollingsworth
thread.title_full: Zip Scanners reviewed by Venita Hollingsworth

author: Venita Hollingsworth
title: Venita Hollingsworth
text: I placed an order online yesterday (Sunday) and this morning (Monday) I decided to make a change to the order. According to website, hours are 9-5 and there is no hold time or call tree. I have been calling since 9am today and get an answering machine.Left a message this morning and still no response. (Now 4pm) I now want to cancel my order but no one will call me back. Paypal has already paid, but I want to cancel and get refund. Website is very deceptive.
